name: Drop Off (swagshaw, Huntrox Games)
description:
Welcome to the Drop Off.
A simple dungeon crawler but with all the best parts we could add.

- Juicy combat
- Loot and Gold
- Weapon Upgrades and Gear
- Large Map
- Check Points
- Multiple Enemies and a Boss Fight

Controls:
WASD - Move
Shift - Dash (Uses EP, it recharges so dash a lot)
Left Click - Basic Attack
Right Click - Special Attack (Has Cooldown)
Scroll Wheel - Pick item to use in lowest item bar
E - Use item and Equip gear
1 - Use Sword
2 - Use Bow

The doors allow you to go "Forward and Back" to the main room so you can buy, sell, and upgrade.

Credits:
Huntrox and Swagshaw
Code, Asset Assembly, and some pixel art
